title: GliaStudio | VIDEOLIZE YOUR STORY WITH AI
introduction: GliaStudio is a web-based online video creation platform that simplifies the video creation workflow by offering features such as transition effects, audio background selection, text layout options, text-to-speech technology, voice recording, article-to-video conversion, video resizing, cloud-based editing, and access to free media assets. It also provides different pricing plans for various user needs, including a free trial option.
features: Access to free photo and video stocks
pricing: GliaStudio offers different pricing plans based on user needs: a plan for storytellers with up to 50 videos, 720p resolution, and 20GB upload storage; a plan for businesses with up to 100 videos, 1080p resolution, and 60GB upload storage; and a customized enterprise plan for mass video production with branded themes and unlimited media assets.

faqs.question: Is GliaStudio a downloadable software?
faqs.answer: No, GliaStudio is a web-based online video creation platform that does not require any software installation.

faqs.question: Can users upgrade or cancel their plan anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can upgrade or cancel their plan at any time.

faqs.question: Where can users share their created videos?
faqs.answer: Users can share their videos on websites, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram, and other social platforms in square, vertical, and landscape formats.
